what: Utilize PSRC Household Travel Survey data
title: Utilize PSRC Household Travel Survey data
text: Various functions pull, process visualize PSRC’s Household Travel Survey data geographies Central Puget Sound Region. install package, need Rtools devtools package, installed already: install.packages(c("devtools","installr")) installr::install.Rtools() devtools::install_github("psrc/psrc.travelsurvey") Running sqlite data
